snippet.title: NoReload Heroes Enhanced Edition - Nintendo Switch™ Trailer
snippet.description:
Face down Mephisto’s horde of henchbots and reclaim the mage’s tower in this couch co-op twin-stick shooter for 1 to 4 players. Out now on Nintendo Switch™! https://www.nintendo.com/games/detail/noreload-heroes-enhanced-edition-switch/
Trailer music by Michael Anders: https://www.instagram.com/makipaamichael/
